import React from 'react'; import './App.css' import './Form.css' export default function Confirmation(props) { if (!props.details) { return

No data returned...

} return (

Thanks for ordering. See you soon!

{!props.details.toppings ? `Size: ${props.details.dropdown} Sauce: ${props.details.sauces}`: `Size: ${props.details.dropdown} Sauce: ${props.details.sauces} Topping(s): ${props.details.toppings} ` }

) }
